questionTitle: How many aspects need to be considered while assessing network capacity?

questionOption2: Increasing the variability between servers makes it easier to troubleshoot problems and simpler to deploy and configure new systems
questionOption3: A server with the different set of software, system configuration, and hardware should perform similarly if given the same role in an infrastructure
